metadata.dc:author: Descalzo Señorans, A
Santos de Soto, J
metadata.dc:description: Four patients with complex cyanotic congenital heart disease, who had previously undergone Blalock-Taussig operations, developed severe stenoses of the shunt. All were treated with balloon dilatation. This procedure was successfully in three of them.
metadata.dc:title: Angioplastia con balón de fístulas de Blalock-Taussig estenosadas. Presentación de 4 casos.
[Balloon angioplasty of stenosed Blalock-Taussig shunts. Study of 4 cases].
